name: The Witcher: Of Flesh and Flame Part 1
summary: Geralt is summoned by an old friend to help solve a mystery involving his daughter. Upon his arrival, Geralt is surprised by another friend from the past and he soon finds himself transported to regions beyond his original expectations.
info:
• 册数: 1
  • 话数: 1
  • 作者: CD Projekt RED、Aleksandra Motyka
  • 出版社: Dark Horse Comics
  • 插画: Marianna Strychowska
  • 发售日: December 19, 2018
